fullText: This revival of the 1965 musical feels less like a resurrection than like a séance in which the medium has only intermittent contact with the spirit world.

The phrase "only intermittent contact with the spirit world" suggests the production is not fully realized or successful. | Kimi: The metaphor suggests the revival fails to bring the show fully back to life, offering only sporadic moments rather than a complete resurrection.
